FuncDef: Enabling this command will disable re-learning of MAC addresses on other SAPs within the VPLS. The MAC address will remain attached to a specified SAP for duration of its age-timer.
ExtraInfo: Default: When a SAP or spoke-SDP is part of a Residential Split Horizon Group (RSHG), MAC pinning is activated at creation of the SAP. Otherwise, MAC pinning is not enabled by default.
